messages.content:
We will now explain the math diagram, so please output the situation as data in the xml structure
described below.

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<figures>
    <!-- 点を表す。-->
    <point id="tag_0">
        <name>A</name>
    </point>
    <point id="tag_1">
        <name>B</name>
    </point>
    <!-- 線分を表す。端点２つのidを指定する-->
    <line-segment id="tag_2" point-id1="tag_0" point-id2="tag_1">
        <name>AB</name>
        <!-- valueは線分の長さが具体的に与えらている時に指定する。 -->
        <!-- <value>2</value> -->
    </line-segment>
    <point id="tag_3">
        <name>C</name>
    </point>
    <!-- 円を表す。中心の点のidを指定する-->
    <circle id="tag_4" center-point-id="tag_3">
        <name>C1</name>
    </circle>
    <point id="tag_5">
        <name>D</name>
    </point>
    <line-segment id="tag_6" point-id1="tag_0" point-id2="tag_5">
        <name>AD</name>
    </line-segment>
    <!-- 角度を表す。３つの点を指定する-->
    <angle id="tag_007" point-id1="tag_5" point-id2="tag_0" point-id3="tag_1">
        <name>∠DAB</name>
        <!-- valueは角度が具体的に与えらている時に指定する。 -->
        <!-- <value>30</value> -->
    </angle>
    <point id="tag_8">
        <name>E</name>
    </point>
    <!-- 中点を表す。２つの点とその間に入る中点のidを指定する-->
    <middle-point point-id1="tag_0" point-id2="tag_1" middle-point-id="tag_8" />
    <point id="tag_10">
        <name>F</name>
    </point>
    <!-- 線分上に点がある。-->
    <point-on-line point-id="tag_10" line-id="tag_6" />
    <point id="tag_12">
        <name>G</name>
    </point>
    <!-- 円周上に点がある-->
    <point-on-circle point-id="tag_12" circle-id="tag_4" />
    <!-- 線分が円に接する-->
    <line-tangent-circle line-id="tag_2" circle-id="tag_4" />
    <point id="tag_15">
        <name>H</name>
    </point>
    <circle id="tag_16" center-point-id="tag_15">
        <name>C2</name>
    </circle>
    <!-- ２つの円が接する-->
    <circle-tangent-circle circle-id1="tag_4" circle-id2="tag_16" />
    <!-- ２つの線分が垂直に交わる-->
    <vertical line-id1="tag_2" line-id2="tag_6" />
    <point id="tag_19">
        <name>J</name>
    </point>
    <point id="tag_20">
        <name>K</name>
    </point>
    <line-segment id="tag_21" point-id1="tag_19" point-id2="tag_20">
        <name>JK</name>
    </line-segment>
    <!-- ２つの線分は平行-->
    <parallel line-id1="tag_2" line-id2="tag_21" />
    <line-segment id="tag_2" point-id1="tag_0" point-id2="tag_1">
        <name>AB</name>
    </line-segment>
    <line-segment id="tag_21" point-id1="tag_19" point-id2="tag_20">
        <name>JK</name>
    </line-segment>
    <!-- ２つの線分の長さの比率を指定する -->
    <isometry line-id1="tag_2" line-id2="tag_21" ratio="4:3"/>
    <angle id="tag_027" point-id1="tag_0" point-id2="tag_19" point-id3="tag_20">
        <name>∠AJK</name>
    </angle>
    <!-- ２つの角度の大きさが等しい-->
    <bisector angle-id1="tag_007" angle-id2="tag_027" />
    <point id="tag_29">
        <name>L</name>
    </point>
    <line-segment id="tag_30" point-id1="tag_3" point-id2="tag_29">
        <name>CL</name>
    </line-segment>
    <!-- ２つのオブジェクト（線分）がある点を交点として交わる。-->
    <crossing point-id="tag_8" object-id1="tag_30" object-id2="tag_2" />
    <!-- 線分が水平に保たれる -->
    <horizontal line-id="tag_0"/>
</figures>

Please be sure to follow the rules of xml.
No figure or relationship should be added to the output that is not specified in the input text.
Conversely, It is specified in the input text, but it should not be missing in the output.
For example, if “there is a triangle” is specified, it is not permissible for a right triangle or an isosceles triangle to be drawn. It is also not permitted to have a figure other than a triangle or an extra description.
⊿ABC ⊿ABCとは、点A、点B、点Cを頂点とする直角三角形のことである。

<figures>
    <point id="tag_0">
        <name>A</name>
    </point>
    <point id="tag_1">
        <name>B</name>
    </point>
    <point id="tag_2">
        <name>C</name>
    </point>
    <line-segment id="tag_3" point-id1="tag_0" point-id2="tag_1">
        <name>AB</name>
    </line-segment>
    <line-segment id="tag_4" point-id1="tag_1" point-id2="tag_2">
        <name>BC</name>
    </line-segment>
    <line-segment id="tag_5" point-id1="tag_2" point-id2="tag_0">
        <name>CA</name>
    </line-segment>
    <horizontal line-id="tag_3" />
    <vertical line-id1="tag_4" line-id2="tag_3" />
</figures>
